abilities.description: Luffy launches his arm in a swerving snake-like movement to strike and grip the enemy with an open hand, causing significant damage. Strong enough to break ribs.

keyMoments.title: Gomu Gomu no Snake Shot Debut
keyMoments.description: Luffy debuts this new post-timeskip technique to save Shirahoshi from Hody Jones, breaking one of Hody's ribs in the process.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of this animal-themed variation technique, showcasing Luffy's evolved fighting style.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weaknesses (sea water, Seastone)

notes: Episode 560 features the debut of Gomu Gomu no Snake Shot, one of Luffy's new post-timeskip techniques with animal-themed naming.
